title: Kinematics - position from velocity vs time graph

content.question: During which of the following intervals of time did the object return to position <math alttext="x equals 0" overflow="scroll"> <mi>x</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>0</mn> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="4 seconds is less than t, which is less than 6 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>4</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>6</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="5 seconds is less than t, which is less than 7 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>7</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="9 seconds is less than t, which is less than 11 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>9</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>11</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="10 seconds is less than t, which is less than 15 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="10 seconds is less than t, which is less than 15 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></mstyle></math>
